akas: Nae maeumi deullida South Korea (alternative spelling)
Listen to My Heart USA (informal English title)
Can You Hear My Heart? World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Nae maeumi deullida South Korea (alternative spelling)
Listen to My Heart USA (informal English title)
Can You Hear My Heart? World-wide (English title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: In the heart of the Korean countryside, Can You Hear My Heart opens with the childhood of three people who will remain connected through their entire lives: Dong Joo, the son and heir of a successful businessman; Ma Roo, a smart but poor boy angry at his circumstances; and Woo Ri, the girl who connects them both.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Dong Joo's family plans for a big event, but little do they know that Ma Ru is intent on making a name for himself at the same time. Woo Ri continues pushing her mother and Young Gyu together in hopes of becoming of a family. There's also some kind of trouble brewing in the Cha home...

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: An unexpected tragedy throws the Cha family into chaos. Meanwhile, the Bong family accepts its newest daughter-in-law in the form of Woo Ri's mother, but becoming one big happy household is harder than it looks, especially when Ma Ru decides that he wants nothing to do with his embarrassing relatives.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: A factory fire has long-reaching consequences for everyone: the Cha family, who own and operate it, and the Bong family, whose lives are changed forever when one of their own doesn't get out in time.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Ma Roo is now known as Jun Ha, a rich and successful doctor; Woo Ri has become her father's caretaker; Dong Joo has adapted to his deafness by employing tricks to pretend he can still hear. Their lives are entirely different... but fate has a funny way of bringing people together.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Woo Ri goes on television to appeal to her "missing brother." Both Dong Roo and Jun Ha happen to cross her path, but who will recognize who after so many years apart?

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Woo Ri and Jun Ha have reconnected, but she has no idea he's really her long-lost oppa - and still hiding under his new name and identity, he has no inclination to tell her. Meanwhile, Seung Chul struggles with unrequited feelings and Dong Joo makes a new friend in Young Gyu.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Yeon Sook continues pulling Jun Ha's strings. Dong Joo pulls a few of his own in order to help Woo Ri sell her paintings. She wants nothing to do with the Cha family after the fire that killed her mother, but she has to finance her search for her brother somehow...

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Woo Ri becomes Dong Joo's shadow, but he can't decide if it's a welcome distraction or an annoying habit. Jun Ha has to make a decision after Yeon Sook whispers in his ear. Young Gyu faces trouble at work; Dong Joo makes an unexpected move in the company that will affect them both.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Woo Ri confronts Dong Joo about his new business plan. To forget her troubles, Min Soo takes her for a girls' night out of drinking, but an unexpected appearance by Jun Ha complicates the situation even further. Young Gyu sees more than anyone realizes.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Woo Ri and her father take care of Dong Joo after his collapse. Yeon Sook and Jin Chul continue their game of cat and mouse. Dong Joo and Jun Ha have a talk about their love lives, neither realizing that they're both falling for the same woman.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Is Jun Ha secretly Ma Roo? That's what Sun Geum believes, and Jun Ha has a hard time convincing her otherwise. Meanwhile, Young Gyu shows off his new writing skills, Shin Ae makes trouble, and Dong Joo and Woo Ri share a moment on his piano, re-igniting old feelings and old memories.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Having realized his secret hearing loss, Woo Ri is left with the choice of playing along or telling Dong Joo the cat's out of the bag. Things aren't helped by Jun Ha, who has grown suspicious about the amount of time Dong Joo's been spending with her and is determined to equal the balance.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Jin Chul starts a fight, but Yeon Sook isn't giving an inch, not with her plan so close to bearing fruit. Sun Geum's health continues to worry her family. Dong Joo visits Woo Ri at her home, and later, they share an important first.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Now that they've kissed, there's no reason for Dong Joo not to meet Woo Ri's family, so off he goes to the Bong/Hwang/Lee house for a taste of what it's like to have a real - if wacky - home. Meanwhile, Yeon Sook's plan starts to fall apart.

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: The newest employee of the company comes with a surprise: her face. Yeon Sook gets wind of the plot to find Ma Roo and is forced to take action. Jun Ha and Woo Ri share a fun day together, but when Dong Joo catches them in an intimate moment, it may cause more harm than good.

17.title: Episode #1.17

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Woo Ri meets her mother's lookalike. Seung Chul returns from his business trip only to realize that he's lost Woo Ri to two brothers... who have, at last, figured out how they both feel. A shocking secret finally meets daylight, but will its players be able to handle the fallout?

18.title: Episode #1.18

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: Woo Ri attempts to establish some boundaries in her relationships, but a company outing means everything gathered in one place at the same time, and sparks refuse not to fly. Meanwhile, Jin Chul grows suspicious of Jun Ha's true parentage and begins asking questions, and Shin Ae causes a ripple effect when she has a talk with Jun Ha.

19.title: Episode #1.19

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: A heated argument between Jun Ha and Sun Geum leaves her in the hospital. Woo Ri is just happy that she found her in time, but Dong Joo struggles with sudden feelings of inadequacy when his deafness proves a problem in emergencies. Jin Chul gets a taste of his own medicine during a family dinner.

20.title: Episode #1.20

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Dong Joo challenges Jin Chul. Seung Chul accepts his fate. With no more secrets between them, Woo Ri and Jun Ha finally reach an understanding, but she hasn't been the only one missing Ma Roo... and her father is about to get the shock of his life when he sees Jun Ha's face for the first time.

21.title: Episode #1.21

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: Young Gyul struggles with the knowledge that his son is close and yet so far. Jun Ha must decide if he's ready to confront his past once and for all, but things grow complicated when the police want answers about Jin Chul's business, and they're willing to get them by any means necessary.

22.title: Episode #1.22

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: Woo Ri tries to hold her family together in the wake of everything's that happened. Jun Ha has a talk with Jin Chul, but neither is sure of the other's intentions. No longer able to rely on her adopted son, Yeon Sook turns to Dong Joo to get her revenge.

23.title: Episode #1.23

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: Brothers come to blows as Jun Ha and Dong Joo question each other's motives. Young Gyu and Mi Sook grow closer. Shin Ae makes trouble when she tells the family she's seen Ma Roo, but the biggest announcement of the night comes from Dong Joo and a certain explosive press conference.

24.title: Episode #1.24

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: Yeon Sook is infuriated when Dong Joo announces his deafness to the public, but he's done being manipulated by her, a fact that drives them both to dangerous and unexpected extremes. In the wake of their confrontation, lies are exposed, secret meetings are held and hospital visits are made.

25.title: Episode #1.25

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: The gloves are off between Dong Joo and Jin Chul, and 15-year-old secrets are only the first fuels of the fire. Jun Ha takes advantage of their enmity to grow closer to his father, but what bigger game is he playing? And when Dong Joo and Jin Chul want to take the business in opposite directions, who will come out on top?

26.title: Episode #1.26

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: Jun Ha and Jin Chul have an argument; Young Gyu and Mi Sook have a misunderstanding. Even as things settle down for Woo Ri's love life, the rest of her affairs aren't so simple, especially when Energy Cell is threatened by something bigger than everyone.

27.title: Episode #1.27

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

27.plot: Woo Ri tries to convince Jun Ha to reconcile with Dong Joo, but he isn't having it, not with the fate of the company still so uncertain. Yeon Sook prepares for a final strike against Jin Chul. Woo Ri and Dong Joo have their first "official" date.

28.title: Episode #1.28

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

28.plot: The motives behind Jun Ha's plans come to light, but is it too late for him to be redeemed? As a shareholder's meeting approaches, Dong Joo is forced to decide if he wants to fight for Energy Cell or simply cut his losses and move on. Shin Ae and Jin Chul finally clear the air.

29.title: Episode #1.29

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

29.plot: Fifteen years ago, a factory fire stole everything that Woo Ri held dear. Now another blaze threatens the future and safety of not just the company, but everyone she cares about. Who will emerge from the flames? What relationships will survive? One thing's for sure: once the dust settles, things will never be the same.

30.title: Episode #1.30

episode of.title: Can You Hear My Heart? (TV Series 2011– )

30.plot: In the emotional finale of Can You Hear My Heart, everyone gathers for a funeral and says goodbye to one of their own. Secrets are revealed, sins are forgiven and relationships are put to the final test as everyone considers what it means to really be a family.

imdb.plot outline: Can You Hear My Heart features Hallyu stars Kim Jae Won, Hwang Jung Eum and Nam Goong Min in this romantic drama that shows us love in defiance of physical limitations. Dong Joo (played by Kim Jae Won) suffers from deafness, but in his pursuit of the lovely and brilliant Bong Woo Ri (Hwang Jung Eum), he pretends that he can hear as well as anyone else to win her heart. However, Bong Woo Ri also deceives a loved one: in an effort to comfort her mentally slow father, she hides her brilliance. Through the love they strive to attain, Dong Joo and Woo Ri learn to communicate in ways outside of normal means in this heartwarming and romantic series.
imdb.title: Can You Hear My Heart?
plot: Can You Hear My Heart features Hallyu stars Kim Jae Won, Hwang Jung Eum and Nam Goong Min in this romantic drama that shows us love in defiance of physical limitations. Dong Joo (played by Kim Jae Won) suffers from deafness, but in his pursuit of the lovely and brilliant Bong Woo Ri (Hwang Jung Eum), he pretends that he can hear as well as anyone else to win her heart. However, Bong Woo Ri also deceives a loved one: in an effort to comfort her mentally slow father, she hides her brilliance. Through the love they strive to attain, Dong Joo and Woo Ri learn to communicate in ways outside of normal means in this heartwarming and romantic series.
